description: This file is a React functional component named 'App'. It manages a theme state ('light' or 'dark') and provides a toggle button to switch themes. The component applies the selected theme to the document's root element and displays UI elements including a logo, informational text, and a link to the React website.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that initializes theme state, sets document theme attribute, and renders UI including a theme toggle button.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function toggling the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
